# Custom Instructions for GitHub Copilot

## Project Overview
- This is a backend application that provides REST APIs for a simple e-commerce platform built with Java Spring Boot and MySQL.

## Backend Guidelines
- Java Spring Boot
- Database: MySQL
- Build Tool: Maven/Gradle

## Architecture Patterns
- Follow RESTful API design principles
- Use MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture pattern
- Use Abstract Factory Design Pattern
- Use Decorator Design Pattern

## Coding Style & Conventions
- Code should be as clean and readable as possible
- Indent with 2 spaces ONLY
- variables and functions should use camelCase


## Language & Communication
- GitHub Copilot must ALWAYS communicate in Vietnamese.
- All explanations, comments, suggestions, and answers should be written in Vietnamese.
- Code can be written in English, but explanations and discussions must be in Vietnamese.
- If the user writes in Vietnamese, respond only in Vietnamese.
- If you don't understand my question, ask for clarification in Vietnamese.
